Static Public Attributes

static const int BEHAVIOR_DETECT_PRESS = 1 << 0
 When a key is pressed, it will stay pressed until the key has been released.
static const int BEHAVIOR_DETECT_TAP = 1 << 1
 When a key is pressed, it is released immediately. Tapped buttons cannot be held down.
static const int BEHAVIOR_DETECT_RELEASE = 1 << 2
 When a key is released after being pressed, the action is triggered.

static const int STATE_RELEASED = 1 << 1
 The button this Action represents is released.
static const int STATE_PRESSED = 1 << 0
 The button this Action represents is pressed.

class InputManager

Detailed Description

Action maps a button to a behavior.

The Action class encapsulates a behavior. An action is created with the inputmanager. When creating an action an InputDevice must be specified, as well as a code representing the key that triggers this Action. An Action can have two types of behavior, pressing and tapping. The Action methods are thread safe.

Definition at line 233 of file Inputmanager.h.
